MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton affecting customers on Black Firs Lane, Holmes Chapel Road and surrounding area. Our engineers have isolated a fault on the underground cable network and restored supplies to some properties, as the repairs required are extensive we will be restoring our customers without supply via generator and we are awaiting delivery of these. We expect supplies to be restored by this method by 1:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30am on 27th January 2021
